title: Ice and water: a case study
creator_credit: Andrew Millington, BBC-TV and Open University
brief_description: A case study of the ice/water system. Considers: the two properties of the ice/water system, the odd density variation with temperature and the fact that ice melts at zero degrees centigrade when subject to a high pressure. (Solids, liquids and gases series; unit 16)
